thread.title: Margaret Hansen
thread.title_full: Auto Lenders reviewed by Margaret Hansen

author: Margaret Hansen
title: Margaret Hansen
text: Unfortunately, my husband and I found ourselves in a position where we needed to purchase a car immediately. We walked into Auto Lenders with anxiety about the car buying process. Stratis M., the GM and Mike Simione, the sales rep are fantastic and straight shooters. They told us exactly how Auto Lenders works with complete transparency. Mike listened to what we wanted and gave us options when we weren't sure. He didn't try to sell us on things we did not want or need. We drove several cars and picked the best one for our needs. Go see Mike!
